```mermaind
classDiagram
    Component <|-- Decorator : extends and uses
    Decorator <|-- ConcreteDecorator
    Decorator <|-- ConcreteDecoratorN
    Component <|-- ConcreteComponent
    Component <|-- ConcreteComponentN
    class Component{
      <<abstract>>
      +methodA()
      +methodB()
    }
    class Decorator {
      - Component : component
    }
```

```mermiad
classDiagram
    Engine <|-- Electrical
    Engine <|-- FourStroke
    Engine <|-- TwoStroke
    Engine <|-- TurboCharger
    Engine <-- TurboCharger : component
    TurboCharger <|-- Electric
    TurboCharger <|-- Sequential
    TurboCharger <|-- Single
    TurboCharger <|-- TwinScroll
    class Engine {
      <<abstract>>
      # horsePower : int
      acceptedBy() List
      horsePower() int
    }
    class TurboCharger {
      <<abstract>>
      # Engine : engine
      # List : enginesAllowed
      isAllowed() bool
      addHorsePower() int
      toString() String
    }
    
```
